line_1: Steady and true each circumstance she weighs,
line_2: Nor to bare words inglorious tribute pays.

line_1: Where Libra lifts her airy arm, and weighs,
line_2: Poised in her silver ballance, nights and days;

line_1: And every deed in golden ballance weighs)
line_2: And down descends, enwrapt in peerless blaze,

line_1: And every deed in golden ballance weighs)
line_2: To deal forth guerdon meet to good and evil ways.
Who on her lips her fingers lays,

line_1: And rights both human and divine she weighs.
line_2: Justice her equal scale aloft displays,

line_1: The globe, and all its empires weighs,
line_2: The sage who large of soul surveys
